sourcesContent:
//Tabla que muestra el progreso de isoTracker import "./progressTable.css" const ProgressTable = props =>{ var headers, progress //Si el user es admin muestra mas informacion const currentProgress = props.progress const currentProgressWidth = String(currentProgress)+"%" const currentRealProgress = props.realProgress const currentRealProgressWidth = String(currentRealProgress)+"%" console.log(currentRealProgress) if (props.user === "admin"){ headers = Progress Progress ISO Real progress Real progress ISO progress =
{currentProgress}%
50%
{currentRealProgress}%
60%
}else{ headers = Progress Progress ISO progress =
40%
50%
} return ( {headers} {progress}
); }; export default ProgressTable;
